name: Whispers
description: Whispers is a first-person horror game. You play the role as a caretaker of a house out in the country. You have to keep an eye on the house for your friend. The house is located somewhere in a field away from the city. He left instructions for you to follow.

reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this game because of two major flaws:  - Frequent crashes: During the 50 minutes it took me to complete the game, it crashed about 8 times. The crashes make you replay much of the game because you can only save in certain spots.  - Very high cost per hour: Without the crashes, it would have taken me about 30 minutes to complete the game, which, at the current full price of 4.99€, means that you are paying just under 10€ per hour of gameplay.
